snippet: Congress is set to return to work after its midsummer recess. While little legislation is expected to pass before the midterm elections in November, immigration is expected to remain the rhetorical focus on Washington.
abstract: Congress is set to return to work after its midsummer recess. While little legislation is expected to pass before the midterm elections in November, immigration is expected to remain the rhetorical focus on Washington.

headline.main: What's News in Washington: Immigration Fireworks
